mapper.select: SELECT a.cp_board_no, a.cp_board_intro, b.user_id, b.cp_ceo_name, a.cp_board_area, a.cp_board_date, a.cp_board_reper_img, a.cp_board_del_yn FROM company_board a, company_info b WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = b.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_board( cp_board_no, cp_board_intro, user_id VARCHAR2, cp_board_content, cp_board_area, cp_board_date, cp_board_reper_img, cp_board_del_yn ) VALUES ( (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM company_board), #{cpBoardIntro}, #{userId}, #{cpBoardContent}, #{cpBoardArea}, SYSDATE, #{cpBoardReperImg}, 'N' )
